author: remm
msg: - The forward request attributes must reflect the original request. So only set them
if the request being passed doesn't have them.

author: luehe
msg: Added support for configurable session id length

author: billbarker
msg: Went back and re-read the spec.
A url-pattern of /protected/* must match a request for /protected.  Hence a special case for this one.

author: billbarker
msg: Before, a url-pattern of /s/* would match /simon/rant.html
